strings.title: Find my current location
strings.popup: You are within {distance} {unit} of this point.
strings.outsideMapBoundsMsg: You are currently located outside the boundaries of the map.

about.desc:
Why plan ahead when you can live in the moment?

Welcome to reac.TOR - your premiere source for finding out what's happening in Toronto. reac.TOR shows you what's going on in your neighbourhood and around the city today, tomorrow, or this weekend.

reac.TOR aggregates data from several popular event listing sites, drawing them all on a single map so you can see what's happening where you are or where you'll be. Decide whether you want to go listen to an up-and-coming band at the local pub, cheer on your favourite team, take in a show, or join in the fun at a community festival...

reac.TOR puts you in control

Every day, there are dozens of different events across the city. reac.TOR's filters allow you to choose the date, the price, and the type of event so you only see the events you want to see. You can also filter the events displayed on the map by source.

reac.TOR is responsive

Designed for mobile devices, event clustering keeps the map from getting too cluttered at any scale and at any screen size. Simply click on a cluster to break it into smaller clusters or individual events. Colour-coded map markers help you quickly spot the events you're most interested in.

Getting started

When you open reac.TOR, you'll automatically see all the events happening in Toronto for that given day. Click on an event marker to see essential information - what, when, where - about a particular event. If you're intrigued, click more info to open an expanded popup with event details.

Click the menu button in the top-left corner, and you'll see a list of filters to help you narrow down what's displayed on the map to only what/when/where you're interested in.

Use the neighbourhood selector to zoom to an area of your choice, or click the geolocator (underneath the zoom controls) to find exactly where you are on the map. If all else fails, click the magnifying glass in the top-right corner to search and zoom to an address on the map.

Why go through the trouble of sorting through countless events yourself when you don't have to?

Don't be proactive - get reactive!
